Title: Relates to the passing of stopped school buses on divided highways and to the location of school bus stops on divided highways
Summary: Relates to the passing of stopped school buses on divided highways; provides that vehicles traveling in the opposite direction of a school bus on such highway shall not have to stop if a physical barrier is present between the different directions of travel.
LawCode: Amd ยง1174, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the passing of stopped school buses on divided highways with four or more lanes and the location of school bus stops on divided highways with four or more lanes
